The .cfg file has an issue and cannot be:
The .cfg file has an issue
   and cannot be used!
No config file found in SD: No config file found in SD
message_02-1:
1. The bezel config file is placed in the folder
corresponding to the emulation name in 'anbernic/bezels'
 of SD1, with the extension .cfg
message_02-2:
2. The bezel image .png and the config file .cfg are
 placed together, and the .cfg file needs to have the
 correct settings for the .png file name
message_02-3:
3. Please set the 'Bezels' in 'App Center-Apps' to 'AUTO',
and 'Auto_load_save' to 'OFF', so that the bezel can be
customized normally
